BadgeDetail.Name: Salon Management - Public Relations
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they understand how to manage public relations. They understand current PR trends, can run a PR event and deal effectively with PR issues.

Task.Title: The event
Task.Body: Upload your PR event material and/or video.
